name: Add BigMailer contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact is created in BigMailer, Make will automatically add that contact to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iqkR1XuSVHddOEXDP4g7wLINlkZaPpitP9zqZPtyLUo/edit?usp=sharing).
